mapper.select: select go_id, create_time, modify_time, black_user_id, white_user_Id, go_context, room_id, is_end, end_time, last_user_id, go_result from gobang.gb_go where go_id = #{goId}
select go_id, create_time, modify_time, black_user_id, white_user_Id, go_context, room_id, is_end, end_time, last_user_id, go_result from gobang.gb_go limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into gobang.gb_go(create_time, modify_time, black_user_id, white_user_Id, go_context, room_id, is_end, end_time, last_user_id, go_result) values (#{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{blackUserId}, #{whiteUserId}, #{goContext}, #{roomId}, #{isEnd}, #{endTime}, #{lastUserId}, #{goResult})
mapper.update:
update gobang.gb_go
create_time = #{createTime},
modify_time = #{modifyTime},
black_user_id = #{blackUserId},
white_user_Id = #{whiteUserId},
go_context = #{goContext},
room_id = #{roomId},
is_end = #{isEnd},
end_time = #{endTime},
last_user_id = #{lastUserId},
go_result = #{goResult},
where go_id = #{goId}
